title: UFYB 106: Listener Q&A Vol. 16
itunes:title: Listener Q&A Vol. 16
description:
The questions I've received over the past week were so interesting and thoughtful, and I’m excited to address these topics on the podcast today.

They range from how thought work aligns with the concept of mindfulness, questions about coaching others and how I facilitate coaching sessions, to whether there is a right or wrong reason to practice thought work.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://unfuckyourbrain.com/106
